mapper.select: SELECT ru.f_id id, ru.f_url url, ru.f_url_desc urlDesc, ru.f_level `LEVEL`, ru.f_parent_id parentId FROM t_user u INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.f_sys_del_state = 0 AND ur.f_user_id = u.f_id INNER JOIN t_role r ON r.f_sys_del_state = 0 AND ur.f_role_id = r.f_id INNER JOIN t_role_resource rr ON rr.f_sys_del_state = 0 AND rr.f_role_id = r.f_id INNER JOIN t_resource_url ru ON ru.f_sys_del_state = 0 AND ru.f_id = rr.f_resource_url_id WHERE u.f_id = #{userId} AND r.f_system_code = #{systemCode} AND ru.f_system_code = #{systemCode} ORDER BY ru.f_order DESC
